name: TOWERACE
description:
2-4 PLAYERS    RETRO FUTURISTIC DESIGN    CHICKEN MODE    SYNTHWAVE

TOWERACE is a party arcade racing game, in which players buy towers between rounds, which slow down opponents and provide tower owners with the opportunity to win. Challenge your friends to see who is the fastest racer and the best strategist on a retro futuristic neon track dotted with towers. The last one is a chicken!

TOWERACE is an entry into the 2021 Summer Game Dev game jam competition, and was created in 4 weeks by a team of 5.

TOWERACE is best enjoyed with a controller

Authors: Filip Goliaš / Viktor Kováč / Martin Stanček / Barbora Šmirinová / Emma Zahradnikova
